thread.section_title: Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Stay
thread.title_full: Lovely Stay - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: geordy
title: Lovely Stay
text:
Was there for coldest week they had thus far this season!
Luckily the hotel is close to transportation and Rues Cler and St Dominique area so could walk out to breakfast and dinner and not freeze!
Dined out in area each nite but for one when had a huge lunch and just picked up cheese from the wonderful cheese shop across the street.
Room was spacious, got a superior due to Jan rates, and comfortable, good bed, bathroom, mini bar, safe, etc.
Just wish didn't have to keep entering info in in active for more than a few minutes!
The pre-stay survey is a great idea..let's you know they are indeed ready to welcome you!
